extendedInfo.description: This is the silent camera app without shutter sound.You can also use as normal camera by setting to fine mode.Please make use of taking your pet, etc.** Please refrain from using against public morals **Features:- Light- Screen filter- Picture size- Focus mode- ISO sensibility- Self-timer- Image stabilizer- Guide line- Zoom (Unsupported models: Pseudo-zoom)- Exposure compensation (Unsupported models: Make correction after shooting)- Fine mode(High resolution, with shutter sound)- Shooting widget  * Foreground type: launch app when shooting  * Background type: not launch app when shooting- Launch external edit app- Toggle front camera (Android 2.3 or later only)Please refer to the user manual on the preference screen if you use the first time.Additional features of paid version:- No Ads- Burst shooting(up to 18 shots)- Multi exposure mode- Picture edit mode(Rotate, Resize, Effect)- Additional setting options(autosave, custom widget icon, etc.)Please consider paid version if you liked free version!** Notes **- Because some features are Machine-dependent, they may be unsupported, or them behavior may be different by the device.- This app uses internet access permission for display Ads.- Background type widget doesn't work properly in some models.- If you offer camera info, I use it as data for development. (e.g. Improvement, Bug fix)

reviews.title: ILove It
reviews.comment: If your reading this download it ! Its amazing
reviews.author: Kierra Iglus

reviews.title: The best camera by far

reviews.title: Galaxy s2 epic touch 4G
reviews.comment: First and only app that silents the shutter & automatically switches between landscape and portrait. Great app!!! Would give it 5 stars if i could delete pics directly from app, instead of having to go to the gallery.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: i will give 5 star IF i can capture hq image i mean large size without shutter sound... and add more image editor or more features but the rest is great...

reviews.title: Has potential.
reviews.comment: Not a bad camera. I like how most options are conveniently located on screen. However, needs to support front cam and resolutions larger than 800 x 480.
